- -  - - -  33.3 9.8 36.5 54.4 43.0 16.7 47.1 65.0 44.5 18.8 49.1 65.0 44.4 17.6 49.2 65.8 46.2 21.8 49.1 66.4  59.1 37.4 61.9 76.9 60.0 38.5 62.7 77.4  We have presented CornerNet, a new approach to object detection that detects bounding boxes as pairs of corners. We evaluate CornerNet on MS COCO and demonstrate competitive results.
